alert.note: Alert for Leon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Leon County through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Buffalo, or 22 miles southeast of Teague, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Corinth, Jewett, Redland, Pleasant Springs, Flo, Centerview, Robbins and Eunice. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 162 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Texas.
